---
title: "Cumulative Link Mixed Models"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r CLMM, warning=FALSE, tidy=TRUE, tidy.opts=list(width.cutoff=60)}

#Load packages
library(haven)
library(ordinal)

#Load in data
Study_1 <- read_sav("Long Form Data 1.sav")
Study_2 <- read_sav("Long Form Data 2.sav")

#Set Judgment to ordered factor
Study_1$Judgment <- factor(Study_1$Judgment, ordered = TRUE)
Study_2$Judgment <- factor(Study_2$Judgment, ordered = TRUE)

#Run models
model_4_1 <- clmm(Judgment ~ 1 + MFQ.Harm + MFQ.Fair + MFQ.Loyal + MFQ.Authority + MFQ.Purity + Behavior_RE + MFQ.Harm*Behavior + MFQ.Fair*Behavior_RE + MFQ.Loyal*Behavior_RE + MFQ.Authority*Behavior_RE + MFQ.Purity*Behavior_RE + (1+Behavior_RE|ID), data = Study_1, link = "probit")
model_4_2 <- clmm(Judgment ~ 1 + MFQ.Harm + MFQ.Fair + MFQ.Loyal + MFQ.Authority + MFQ.Purity + Behavior_RE + MFQ.Harm*Behavior + MFQ.Fair*Behavior_RE + MFQ.Loyal*Behavior_RE + MFQ.Authority*Behavior_RE + MFQ.Purity*Behavior_RE + (1+Behavior_RE|ID), data = Study_2, link = "probit")

#Output
summary(model_4_1)
summary(model_4_2)
```
